Name: PixelPounce
Description: Hailing from the retro digital plains of WebtrES Club, PixelPounce is a feline entity with a flair for the classics. Encased in a box reminiscent of a vintage gaming console, PixelPounce's screen glows with the fierce red and black of a warrior's spirit. Its limbs, true to its cat-like nature, are forever poised for playful combat or to deftly manipulate the retro console buttons that make up its core control system. Atop its boxy head rests a sturdy helmet, a trophy from the many virtual battles it has won. PixelPounce spends its days reminiscing about the golden era of 8-bit adventures and purring over high scores in games long forgotten by the modern world.
